lines.text:
* Stillness... until something
  isn't where it should be

* Last week, I sneezed during
  testing

* When I came back, every pen
  on my desk was perfectly
  parallel

* The guy at the front desk
  thinks it's Monday, when
  it's actually Tuesday

* Before you go in, you
  could take a look at
  these reports on the table

* They'll give you an idea
  of what we've done so far
